animeTitle: Otoko wa Tsurai yo: Torajirou Wasurenagusa
animeDescription: Anime adaptation of the "Otoko wa Tsurai yo (It's tough being a man)" film series by Youji Yamada.Kuruma Torajirou (or Tora-san), a traveling salesman whose sole possessions include only the contents of a small suitcase, the clothes on his back and some pocket money, wanders from town to town peddling his wares.(Source: Wikipedia)
animeStaff: [['Dezaki, Satoshi', 'Producer'], ['Shibuichi, Setsuko', 'Director, Storyboard'], ['Abe, Kouji', 'Art Director'], ['Kobayashi, Yukari', 'Character Design, Chief Animation Director']]
